steps.description: Travel to Goldshire
Talk to Marshal Dughan and turn in Report to Goldshire. Accept The Fargodeep Mine
Talk to Smith Argus and train Blacksmithing

tips.text: This will allow you to make Rough Sharpening Stones which increase melee hits by +2 Damage. This is very significant early on
This will allow you to make Rough Sharpening Stones which increase melee hits by +2 Damage. This is very significant early on
This will allow you to make Rough Weightstones which increase melee hits by +2 Damage. This is very significant early on

steps.description: Talk to Corina Steele. Buy and equip a Gladius

tips.text: Buy and equip a Gladius

steps.description: Talk to Corina Steele. Buy and equip a Stiletto

tips.text: Buy and equip a Stiletto

steps.description: Talk to Corina Steele. Buy and equip a Wooden Mallet

tips.text: Buy and equip a Wooden Mallet

steps.description: Talk to Andrew Krighton and vendor trash

tips.text: Vendor trash

steps.description: Talk to Marshal Dughan and turn in Report to Goldshire. Accept The Fargodeep Mine
Talk to William Pestle and accept Kobold Candles
Talk to Innkeeper Farley and turn in Rest and Relaxation. Set your Hearthstone to Goldshire
Grind to level 6
Talk to Brog Hamfist. Buy a Balanced Throwing Dagger and equip it

tips.text: Buy a Balanced Throwing Dagger and equip it

steps.description: Travel downstairs
Talk to Maximillian Crowe and train your class spells
Talk to Cylina Darkheart. Buy the Grimoire of Blood Pact (Rank 1) if you can afford it. If not you will buy it later

tips.text: Buy the Grimoire of Blood Pact (Rank 1) if you can afford it. If not you will buy it later

steps.description: Travel upstairs in the Inn
Talk to Zaldimar Wefhellt and train your class spells
Talk to Priestess Josetta and turn in In Favor of the Light. Accept Garments of the Light and train your class spells
Talk to Keryn Sylvius and train your class spells
Talk to Michelle Belle upstairs and train First Aid
Talk to Innkeeper Farley. Buy Dalaran Sharp until you're down to 1 Silver

tips.text: Buy Dalaran Sharp until you're down to 1 Silver
Buy up to 20 Dalaran Sharp

steps.description: Talk to Lyria Du Lac and train your class spells
Talk to Brother Wilhelm and train your class spells
Talk to Remy Two Times and accept Gold Dust Exchange
Cast Lesser Heal (Rank 2) and Power Word: Fortitude on Guard Roberts

tips.text: Cast Lesser Heal (Rank 2) and Power Word: Fortitude on Guard Roberts

steps.description: Talk to Ma Stonefield and Auntie Bernice Stonefield. Accept Lost Necklace and Princess Must Die!
Talk to Billy Maclure and turn in Lost Necklace. Accept Pie for Billy
Talk to Maybell Maclure and accept Young Lovers
Talk to Joshua Maclure. Buy as much Ice Cold Milk as you can afford. Vendor trash

tips.text: Buy as much Ice Cold Milk as you can afford
Buy as much Ice Cold Milk as you can afford
Buy as much Ice Cold Milk as you can afford

steps.description: Talk to Tommy Joe Stonefield and turn in Young Lovers. Accept Speak with Gramma
Kill Stonetusk Boars. Loot them for their Chunks of Boar Meat
Talk to Auntie Bernice Stonefield and turn in Pie for Billy. Accept Back to Billy
Talk to Gramma Stonefield and turn in Speak with Gramma. Accept Note to William
Talk to Billy Maclure and turn in Back to Billy. Accept Goldtooth
Explore Fargodeep Mine
Kill Goldtooth. Loot him for Bernice's Necklace
Kill Kobold Tunnelers and Kobold Miners. Loot them for their Candles and Dust

tips.text: If you loot any Rough Stones turn them into Rough Sharpening Stones
If you loot any Rough Stones turn them into Rough Sharpening Stones
If you loot any Rough Stones turn them into Rough Weightstones

steps.description: Talk to Auntie Bernice Stonefield and turn in Goldtooth
Grind until 2690+/4500xp
Travel to Goldshire
Talk to Remy Two Times and turn in Gold Dust Exchange. Accept A Fishy Peril

tips.text: Do NOT vendor the Bag of Marbles reward. This is an incredibly valuable item all the way through to level 60

steps.description: Talk to Marshal Dughan and turn in A Fishy Peril. Accept Further Concerns. Turn in The Fargodeep Mine. Accept The Jasperlode Mine
Talk to Corina Steele and vendor trash

tips.text: Vendor trash

steps.description: Talk to William Pestle and turn in Kobold Candles. Accept Shipment to Stormwind. Turn in Note to William. Accept Collecting Kelp
Grind to level 8
Talk to Lyria Du Lac and train your class spells
Talk to Brother Wilhelm and train your class spells
Travel downstairs in the Inn
Talk to Maximillian Crowe and train your class spells
Talk to Cylina Darkheart. Buy the Grimoire of Firebolt (Rank 2) if you can afford it. If not you will buy it later

tips.text: Buy the Grimoire of Firebolt (Rank 2) if you can afford it. If not you will buy it later

steps.description: Travel upstairs in the Inn
Talk to Zaldimar Wefhellt and train your class spells
Talk to Priestess Josetta and turn in Garments of the Light. Train your class spells
Talk to Keryn Sylvius and train your class spells
Talk to Michelle Belle and train First Aid
Talk to Brog Hamfist. Buy a Small Brown Pouch if needed

tips.text: Buy a Small Brown Pouch if needed

steps.description: Talk to Innkeeper Farley. Buy up to 40 Ice Cold Milk or Dalaran Sharp

tips.text: Buy up to 40 Ice Cold Milk

steps.description: Kill Murlocs and Murloc Streamrunners. Loot them for Kelp Fronds
Enter the Jasperlode Mine
Follow the path through middle to explore Jasperlode Mine. Exit Jasperlode Mine as soon as the objective completes

tips.text: Follow the path through middle to explore Jasperlode Mine
Exit Jasperlode Mine as soon as the objective completes

steps.description: Talk to Guard Thomas and turn in Further Concerns. Accept Find the Lost Guards and Protect the Frontier
Click A half-eaten body on the ground and turn in Find the Lost Guards. Accept Discover Rolf's Fate
Talk to Supervisor Raelen and accept A Bundle of Trouble
Talk to Rallic Finn and vendor trash

tips.text: Vendor trash

steps.description: Click Rolf's corpse on the ground and turn in Discover Rolf's Fate. Accept Report to Thomas

tips.text: Cast Renew and Power Word: Shield then get full mana. Pull the 2 Murlocs in front of the huts, move away, then nuke one. Run away when you kill one, then kill the other
Pull the 2 Murlocs in front of the huts, move away and Polymorph one whilst killing the other. Kill the Polymorphed one after

Pool 100 Rage. Pull the 2 Murlocs in front of the huts, move away and keep Hamstring on one whilst killing the other. Also use Bag of Marbles on the one you're killing. Run away and reset the one being kited with Hamstring after you've killed one

Pull the 2 Murlocs in front of the huts, move away and focus killing one of them. Use Evasion once they're both attacking you. This is a good opportunity to use Bag of Marbles. Run away and reset once you've killed one
Pull the 2 Murlocs in front of the huts, move away and cast Fear on one of them constantly, and try to keep DoTs on both

Pull the 2 Murlocs in front of the huts, move away and nuke one of them down fast. Use Divine Protection and your Heals as required. This is a good opportunity to use Bag of Marbles. Run away and reset once you've killed one

steps.description: Kill Prowlers and Young Forest Bears

tips.text: Prioritize killing any Young Forest Bears you see

steps.description: Loot the Bundle of Wood on the ground. They are found beneath the trees

tips.text: They are found beneath the trees

steps.description: Talk to Supervisor Raelen and turn in A Bundle of Trouble
Grind to level 9
Talk to Sara Timberlain and accept Red Linen Goods
Talk to Guard Thomas and turn in Protect the Frontier and Report to Thomas. Accept Deliver Thomas' Report and Report to Gryan Stoutmantle
Kill Princess. Loot her for her Collar

tips.text: Princess will agro with both of her Porcine Entourage
Princess will also cast Rushing Charge which deals heavy damage
Pool 100 Rage before you engage Princess
Be sure Evasion is ready. If you're struggling, you can use the Fence with Throwing Weapons to abuse pathing and buy time
Be ready to use a Lesser Healing Potion
Click here for video reference

steps.description: Kill Defias Bandits. Loot them for their Bandanas
Grind until 3400+/6500xp
Talk to Sara Timberlain and turn in Red Linen Goods
Talk to Ariena Stormfeather and get the Redridge Mountains flight path

tips.text: STICK TO THE MAIN ROAD AND AVOID ANY CLOSE MOBS EN-ROUTE

steps.description: Hearth to Goldshire
Talk to William Pestle and turn in Collecting Kelp. Accept The Escape
Travel upstairs in the Inn
Talk to Michelle Belle and train First Aid
Talk to Marshal Dughan and turn in Deliver Thomas' Report and The Jasperlode Mine. Accept Westbrook Garrison Needs Help! and Cloth and Leather Armor. Accept Report to Gryan Stoutmantle
Talk to Smith Argus and accept Elmore's Task
Grind to level 10
Vendor trash and repair
Talk to Lyria Du Lac and accept A Warrior's Training. Train your class spells
Talk to Brother Wilhelm and train your class spells
Travel downstairs in the Inn
Talk to Maximillian Crowe and train your class spells
Talk to Remen Marcot and accept Gakin's Summons
Go Upstairs
Talk to Priestess Josetta and accept Desperate Prayer. Train your class spells
Talk to Zaldimar Wefhellt and train your class spells
Talk to Keryn Sylvius and train your class spells. Train Dual Wield and Sprint as a minimum. Do not train excess abilities. Save your money

tips.text: Train Dual Wield and Sprint as a minimum. Do not train excess abilities. Save your money

steps.description: Talk to Maybell Maclure and turn in The Escape
Talk to Ma Stonefield and turn in Princess Must Die!
Travel to Westbrook Garrison
Talk to Deputy Rainer and turn in Westbrook Garrison Needs Help!. Accept Riverpaw Gnoll Bounty. Click the Wanted Poster and accept Wanted: Hogger
Kill Hogger. Loot him for his Claw

tips.text: Hogger can spawn in multiple locations
Cast Fear on Hogger continously and use your regular DoTs to kill him
This quest is difficult. Find a group for him if needed. Skip this step if you're unable to find a group or solo him

steps.description: Kill Riverpaw Runts and Riverpaw Outrunners. Loot them for their Armbands
Talk to Marshal Dughan and turn in Wanted: Hogger and The Collector
Talk to Deputy Rainer and turn in Riverpaw Gnoll Bounty
Travel to Westfall
Talk to Farmer Furlbrow and turn in Furlbrow's Deed
Talk to Farmer Furlbrow and Verna Furlbrow. Accept The Forgotten Heirloom, Poor Old Blanchy, and Westfall Stew
Talk to Farmer Saldean and accept The Killing Fields
Talk to Salma Saldean and turn in Westfall Stew. Accept Westfall Stew and Goretusk Liver Pie
Die and respawn at the Spirit Healer
Talk to Gryan Stoutmantle and turn in Report to Gryan Stoutmantle. Accept The People's Militia
Talk to Captain Danuvin and accept Patrolling Westfall
Talk to Quartermaster Lewis and accept A Swift Message. Vendor trash

tips.text: Vendor trash

steps.description: Talk to Thor and turn in A Swift Message. Accept Continue To Stormwind
Talk to Thor and fly to Stormwind
Go inside the building. Buy the level 11 thrown from Thurman. Equip it when you're level 11
Talk to Thurman Mullby. Buy a Balanced Throwing Dagger. Equip it

tips.text: Buy a Balanced Throwing Dagger. Equip it

steps.description: Talk to Morgan Pestle and turn in Shipment to Stormwind

tips.text: We choose the Explosive Rockets as the reward. It deals decent damage, and can be used for Split pulling which is incredibly useful
Click here for video reference on Split pulling. It is a short video and invaluable to learn

steps.description: Talk to Woo Ping and train 1h Swords, Staves, or 2h Swords

tips.text: Train 2h Swords if you have enough money. You must save 20s for later
Train 1h Swords as well if you still have money
Train 1h Swords as well if you still have money

steps.description: Talk to Gunther Weller. Buy a Cutlass and equip it in your Main-Hand

tips.text: Buy a Cutlass and equip it in your Main-Hand

steps.description: Talk to Innkeeper Allison and set your Hearthstone to Stormwind City
Travel to The Slaughtered Lamb and go downstairs
Talk to Gakin the Darkbinder and turn in Gakin's Summons. Accept Surena Caledon
Die and respawn at the Spirit Healer by using Life Tap and standing on the Bonfire next to you
Exit Stormwind. Travel to Goldshire
Talk to Marshal Dughan and turn in Wanted: Hogger and The Collector. Accept Manhunt

tips.text: Choose the Balanced Fighting Stick as your reward. Equip it

steps.description: Grind to level 11
Kill Surena Caledon. Loot her for her Choker. Kill Morgan the Collector. Loot him for The Collector's Ring

tips.text: Focus on killing Surena Caledon very quickly
Cast Fear on Morgan the Collector continously

steps.description: Talk to Sara Timberlain and turn in Cloth and Leather Armor
Talk to Guard Parker and accept Encroaching Gnolls

tips.text: Grind en-route. Make sure you have at least 2 Soul Shards by using Drain Soul

steps.description: Talk to Deputy Feldon and turn in Encroaching Gnolls

tips.text: STICK TO THE MAIN ROAD AND AVOID ANY CLOSE MOBS EN-ROUTE

steps.description: Talk to Ariena Stormfeather and get the Redridge Mountains flight path. Fly to Stormwind
Exit Stormwind. Travel to Goldshire
Talk to Marshal Dughan and turn in Manhunt
Travel to Stormwind City
Travel to The Slaughtered Lamb and go downstairs
Talk to Ursula Deline and train your class spells
Talk to Gakin the Darkbinder and turn in Surena Caledon. Accept The Binding
Travel to the bottom of The Slaughtered Lamb. Use the Bloodstone Choker to call forth a Summoned Voidwalker

tips.text: Travel to the bottom of The Slaughtered Lamb
Use the Bloodstone Choker to call forth a Summoned Voidwalker

steps.description: Kill the Summoned Voidwalker
Talk to Gakin the Darkbinder and turn in The Binding
Talk to Osric Strang and turn in Continue to Stormwind. Accept Dungar Longdrink
Talk to Harry Burlguard and turn in A Warrior's Training. Accept Bartleby the Drunk
Talk to Bartleby and turn in Bartleby the Drunk. Accept Beat Bartleby
Attack Bartleby. He will submit at 1%
Talk to Bartleby and turn in Beat Bartleby. Accept Bartleby's Mug
Talk to Harry Burlguard and turn in Bartleby's Mug
Travel to the Stormwind Cathedral
Talk to High Priestess Laurena and train your class spells. Turn in Desperate Prayer
Talk to High Priestess Laurena and train Desperate Prayer
Talk to Grimand Elmore and turn in Elmore's Task
Talk to Grimand Elmore and accept Stormpike's Delivery
Talk to Kaita Deepforge. Buy a Mining Pick. You'll train Mining very soon

tips.text: Buy a Mining Pick. You'll train Mining very soon

steps.description: Enter the Deeprun Tram. Take the Tram to Ironforge

tips.text: Level your First Aid if needed while waiting for the tram

steps.description: Get on the Tram once it arrives. Get off on the other side and look for Monty on the middle platform. Talk to Monty and accept Deeprun Rat Roundup

tips.text: Cast Summon Voidwalker and Create Healthstone while waiting

steps.description: Use the Rat Catcher's Flute on Deeprun Rats

tips.text: Use the Rat Catcher's Flute on Deeprun Rats

steps.description: Talk to Monty and turn in Deeprun Rat Roundup
Enter Ironforge
Talk to Gryth Thurden and get the Ironforge flight path
Talk to Bixi Wobblebonk and Buliwyf Stonehand. Train Thrown and 2h Maces
Talk to Brenwyn Wintersteel down stairs. Buy a Balanced Throwing Dagger and equip it

tips.text: Buy a Balanced Throwing Dagger and equip it

steps.description: Talk to an Ironforge Auctioneer. Buy Boar Intestines, Bear Meat, and Spider Ichor

tips.text: Buy the following items for a faster turn in at Loch Modan shortly
This will save you time as you won't need to run around looking for mobs to kill. Skip this step if you wish to not buy any

steps.description: Exit Ironforge
Travel to Kharanos
Talk to Razzle Sprysprocket and accept Operation Recombobulation
Talk to Senir Whitebeard and accept Frostmane Hold
Talk to Tundra MacGrann and accept Tundra MacGrann's Stolen Stash
Open MacGrann's Meat Locker. Loot it for MacGrann's Dried Meats

tips.text: Wait until Old Icebeard patrols out of the Cave. Once he patrols out of the Cave you can enter and loot MacGrann's Meat Locker
Click here for video reference
Cast Polymorph on Old Icebeard
Cast Fear on Old Icebeard

steps.description: Talk to Tundra MacGrann and turn in Tundra MacGrann's Stolen Stash
Kill Leper Gnomes. Loot them for their Gears and Cogs
Enter Frostmane Hold
Drop down to this location to explore Frostmane Hold. If there are mobs below, clear around normally and do NOT drop down

tips.text: Drop down to this location to explore Frostmane Hold. If there are mobs below, clear around normally and do NOT drop down

steps.description: Kill Frostmane Headhunters
Travel to Kharanos
Talk to Razzle Sprysprocket and turn in Operation Recombobulation
Talk to Senir Whitebeard and turn in Frostmane Hold. Accept The Reports
Talk to Rudra Amberstill and accept Protecting the Herd
Run up this part of the mountain
Kill Vagash. Loot him for his Fang

tips.text: This quest is difficult. Find a group for him if needed. Skip this step if you're unable to find a group or solo him
Watch the video below before you attempt to kill Vagash. It can be soloed on any class
Click here for video reference

steps.description: Talk to Rudra Amberstill and turn in Protecting the Herd
Talk to Cook Ghilm and train Cooking
Talk to Kazan Mogosh. Buy Freshly Baked Bread if needed. Buy Freshly Baked Bread and Ice Cold Milk if needed

tips.text: Buy Freshly Baked Bread if needed
Buy Freshly Baked Bread if needed

steps.description: Talk to Senator Mehr Stonehallow and Foreman Stonebrow. Accept The Public Servant and Those Blasted Troggs!
Talk to Dank Drizzlecut and train Mining
Cast Find Minerals

tips.text: Cast Find Minerals

steps.description: Kill Rockjaw Skullthumpers and Rockjaw Bonesnappers
Grind until 6350+/7600xp
Talk to Foreman Stonebrow and Senator Mehr Stonehallow. Turn in Those Blasted Troggs! and The Public Servant
Talk to Kazan Mogosh. Vendor trash. Buy 20 Ice Cold Milk

tips.text: Buy 20 Ice Cold Milk
Buy 20 Ice Cold Milk
Buy 20 Ice Cold Milk

steps.description: Grind to level 11
Talk to Pilot Hammerfoot and accept The Lost Pilot
Click the Dwarven Corpse and turn in The Lost Pilot. Accept A Pilot's Revenge
Kill Mangeclaw. Loot him for his Claw
Talk to Pilot Hammerfoot and turn in A Pilot's Revenge

tips.text: Choose the Craftsman's Dagger as your reward. Equip it in your Off-Hand

steps.description: Travel to Loch Modan
